2019

Project/Task Management System

Project/Task Management System has the capacity to help plan, organize, and manage tasks and develop resource estimates. Made with PHP, Codeigniter, Jquery, and Bootstrap

No much images available. Project was way before on my first years of working.

Technologies used

I do have a partner on doing this project.

Back end thingies

  • CodeIgniter framework of PHP which most complex here.

Front end aspects

  • Bootstrap3
  • Admin Template HTML and CSS
  • JQuery

Challenges

Challenges here are

  • Worked in a Team of two. But was pulled out halfway due to new priority
  • But over all no much challenges happened here.
